item.title: Comment on FTMO Account by Jason
item.dc:creator: Jason
item.description: honestly, this comparison with the market leader, FTMO needs a big update. isn't myforexfunds done? - as in finished?...i can't really find them anywhere. and - it's good to know what your competitors are doing right & wrong. it's a natural outcrop of the survival instinct, that's healthy in any long-standing business...beware of your competitors in the jungle. so, i look forward to a serious update...isn't Sun Tzu? - know your enemy, know yourself, and never be at risk in battle...
item.content:encoded:
honestly, this comparison with the market leader, FTMO needs a big update. isn’t myforexfunds done? – as in finished?…i can’t really find them anywhere.
and – it’s good to know what your competitors are doing right & wrong. it’s a natural outcrop of the survival instinct, that’s healthy in any long-standing business…beware of your competitors in the jungle.
so, i look forward to a serious update…isn’t Sun Tzu? – know your enemy, know yourself, and never be at risk in battle…

item.title: Comment on The Real Deal – $173,597 Payout in 6 days! by Alexander
item.dc:creator: Alexander
item.description: FTP is the best, only few prop firms paying weekly. Though have not challenge with you.. but in near future I'm very positive for 200k evaluation....keep it up
item.content:encoded: FTP is the best, only few prop firms paying weekly. Though have not challenge with you.. but in near future I’m very positive for 200k evaluation….keep it up

item.title: Comment on Can You Pass a Funded Trader Evaluation in One Day? Insights from Funded Trading Plus by Edward
item.dc:creator: Edward
item.description: Great read. Very objective. Risk management and consistency and of course resilience. Discipline with focus. Edward Kitavi from Kenya ("Success is a limited edition")
item.content:encoded:
Great read. Very objective. Risk management and consistency and of course resilience. Discipline with focus.
Edward Kitavi from Kenya (“Success is a limited edition”)
